creator: mdke@ubuntu.com
text:
As discussed on the thread
http://article.gmane.org/gmane.text.xml.fop.user/19528 - some footnotes are not
displaying.

If you get a fix for this within a week, and can tell me how to get it, that
would really rock, because we're shipping lots of PDFs and we'd like to have
working footnotes!!

I'm attaching some slimmed down documents so that you can see the bug easier.

On the document, footnote 1 is not displaying, footnotes 2-4 display fine.

thanks, and please ask if you need any more info.

Created attachment 18329
test.fo

Here's the .fo file!
creator: mdke@ubuntu.com

text:
Created attachment 18330
test.pdf

Here's the pdf which comes from that!
creator: mdke@ubuntu.com
junkmail@lordb.de
text:
I've the same problem. It seems that fop doesn't like footnotes in lists. (To be
more specific: in <fo:list-item>) With the current version (0.92beta) you'll
never get footnotes when they are defined in a list-item.

creator: junkmail@lordb.de
text:
Your problem seems to be the same as described in Bug #37579. Try the patch that
is listed there - until the problem is solved completely.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37579 ***
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
